Package org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.living

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LivingAddPotionEffectEvent
    An event that occurs when a Living gains a PotionEffect.
    LivingBreakBlockEvent
    Called when a Living breaks a Location.
    LivingChangeBlockEvent
    Called when a Living changes a Location.
    LivingChangeHealthEvent
    Called when the health of an Living changes.
    LivingDeathEvent
    Called when an Entity is killed or removed due to unload.
    LivingDropItemEvent
    Called when a Living drops an item(s).
    LivingEquipmentChangeEvent
    Called when an entity changes an equipped item.
    LivingEvent
    Describes events which contain a Living.
    LivingExpirePotionEffectEvent
    An event that occurs when a Living's PotionEffect expires.
    LivingHarvestBlockEvent
    Called when a Living entity harvests a Location.
    LivingInteractBlockEvent
    Called when a Living interacts with a Location.
    LivingInteractEntityEvent
    Called when a Living interacts with an Entity.
    LivingInteractEvent
    Called when a Living interacts with the world.
    LivingItemConsumeEvent
    Called when an entity consumes an itemstack for any reason.
    LivingMoveEvent
    Called when a Living moves.
    LivingPickUpItemEvent
    An event where a living entity is picking up an item.
    LivingPlaceBlockEvent
    Called when a Living places a Location.
    LivingPotionEffectEvent
    An event that involves a living entity having effects added and removed.
    LivingRemovePotionEffectEvent
    An event that occurs when a Living's PotionEffect is removed.
    LivingUpdateEvent
    Called when a Living is updated.
